title: Zhanshen Lianmeng
synopsis:
After a magnetic storm strikes the Blue Star Continent, spiritual energy is revived, transforming both humans and animals. This triggers a battle for survival between spirit beasts and humans. Ling Tian, a young prodigy with an ancient divine bloodline and a treasure called the 'God Brain,' discovers that in three years, the continent will face a disaster that will lead to his heroic death. Guided by Yan Ling, his assistant from the future, he embarks on a mission to attain ultimate power and change the continent's fate.

(Source: SIMLK)
